metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14725 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Before version 4.8.2, WordPress was susceptible to an open redirect attack in wp-admin/edit-tag-form.php and wp-admin/user-edit.php.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14725` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.8.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.8.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwenty - 4.8.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentyone - 4.8.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentytwo - 4.8.2+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.8.2+dfsg-1').
